title: Probate - Unable to proceed
header: Sorry, you can’t use the online service
contactProbateOffice: Please download the probate application form (PA1), print it out and fill it in.
noWill: You can’t use the online service because the person who died didn’t leave a will.
notOriginal: You can’t use the online service because you don’t have the original will of the person who died.
notExecutor: You can’t use the online service if you’re not named as an executor or if you’re applying on behalf of someone else.
codicils: You can’t use the online service because there have been updates (‘codicils’) made to the will.
ihtNotCompleted:
You need to complete an inheritance tax form before applying for probate.
Your progress has been saved and will be kept for 6 months.
deathCertificate: You need to have a copy of the death certificate before applying for probate.
